content.company: Digital Transformation Department - Italian Government, Rome
content.details: Fostering a cross-border national API ecosystem. Support Next Generation EU interoperability projects.

content.company: Planning and reviewing multi-tier, resilient, cloud and enterprise architectures based on open-source components. Principal technologies: OpenStack, OpenShift, Kubernetes, Ansible, JBoss, SOAP and REST webservices, database replication.

content.details: Fostering community around open source projects created and participated by Babel.
Manage the delivery of ISP-wide mail systems. I led a team of sysadmins and developers contributing to match the customer requirements in the more standard and open way.

Integrating different communication infrastructures (mail,voip,sms,chat) enhancing various opensource software; from architectural design to software implementation. Maintainer of Caldav4j Libraries. Customization of opensource software (courier-imap, postﬁx, openssl, rrdjtool ..).
Validating the compliance of IT infrastructures to the Italian Privacy Code.

content.company: IT Consultant at Alenia Spazio Spa (now Thales Alenia Space)
content.details: SysAdmin on all unix ﬂavours (Linux, Tru64, Solaris, AIX, Irix); Backup management and design;

I started loving python in 2010 and contributed to various python project, including openstack-shade, openshift-on-openstack templates, python-samba library and the dsadmin ldap framework that is now incorporated in 389ds. Since then I have been selected as a speaker and trainer at Europython for 2012-2022.
CalDAV4j is the java library implementing RFC4791, the open calendaring protocol implemented between others by Apple Calendar Server, Google and Bedework.

Good knowledge of opensource ecosystem learned joining and leading opensource projects. I’ve contributed to various opensource software, including psutil-ng (added thread support to pgrep), dstat, ansible, the MySQL docker image and mysql-utilities, Bedework Calendar Server.
